Edges-Fortune Teller -- Female Human Veteran Fortune Teller
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d4 Strength: d4 Vigor: d10
Skills (20 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d6 Repair: (sma) d6 Survival: (sma) d4
Notice: (sma) d6 Research: (sma) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Occult: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Size: 0
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 6; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Fortune Teller); Forewarning; Sixth Sense; Wizard Hindrances: Curious+; Dread; Vow Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Fortune Teller): Has The Sight feature
Curious+: Insists on investigating every mystery and secret
Dread: +2 rolls on Fear Effects
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 5 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Thick Coat Shield: None Weapons: Holy Water Grenade (None R5"); Mini Crossbow (2d4 R6" AP 1); Spencer Carbine (2d8 R20" AP 2); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Forewarning: May spend a Benny to force a foe to redraw a non-joker Action Card
Sixth Sense: May spend up to 4 Power Points to increase Evasion or reduce damage by an equal amount
The Sight: May spend a Benny to rearrange Action Cards as desired
Arcana
Power Count: 2 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Fortune Teller): 2 Powers/15 Power Points
Wizard: May spend 1 Power Point to change a Power trapping
